definition: not divided or shared with others, right-eyed flatfish, put a new sole on
details:
adjective
- not divided or shared with others
= synonyms: exclusive
- being the only one
= synonyms: lone, lonesome, only, solitary
noun
- right-eyed flatfish
- the underside of footwear or a golf club
- the underside of the foot
- lean flesh of any of several flatfish
= synonyms: fillet of sole
verb
- put a new sole on
= example: put a new sole on
= synonyms: resole
